text: {"answer": "H", "reasoning": "Statement i is false because the executor cannot unilaterally allocate the jewelry against a dissenting heir and cannot end the probate by merely informing the supervisory authority. Statement iv is false because the EU Succession Regulation does not allow the testator to directly determine the jurisdiction for the estate; jurisdiction follows the applicable law, which the testator can only influence indirectly via a choice of law. Statements ii and iii are correct. Hence the false statements are i and iv, corresponding to option H."}
